title: How do I synchronize my B1 data to the Huawei TalkBand app?
answer:
Before you start, ensure the following:  

1.        Your B1 is properly connected to your phone overBluetooth.  

2.        Your phone has been installed with the latestHuawei TalkBand app that runs properly.  

3.        Your phone and your B1 both have sufficientpower.  

After you run the Huawei TalkBand app, it will automaticallysynchronize data with your B1.  

If you want to manuallysynchronize the data, go back to the home screen of the app, swipe down thescreen from any point of the screen, and synchronize the data will besynchronized.
